祔字的基本解释

祔
fù
奉新死者的木主于祖庙与祖先的木主一起祭祀：“卒哭，明日以其班祔。”
合葬：“周公盖祔。”

祔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
(1)祭名。原指古代帝王在宗庙内将后死者神位附于先祖旁而祭祀。
(2)泛指配享、附祭。
(3)合葬。

祔字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祔； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页841第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?符遇切，音附。祭名。【說文】後死者合食於先祖。【禮·檀弓】以吉祭易喪祭，明日祔於祖父。　又合葬亦曰祔。【禮·檀弓】周公蓋祔。【註】謂合葬自周公以來始。又孔子曰：衞人之祔也離之，魯人之祔也合之，善夫。　或省作付。【周禮·春官】大祝付練祥。【註】付當爲祔，祭先王以祔後死者。

祔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
祔字的起名意思

暂无。

worship ancestors
Basic explanation of words
worship ancestors
fù
The wooden lord of Fengxin deceased sacrificed together with the ancestor’s wooden lord in the ancestral temple: "You cry, tomorrow will be his nephew."
Joint burial: "Duke Zhou covers his nephew."
worship ancestors
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" Fu Yuqie, Quyu, Feng. ]
(1) The name of the sacrifice. Originally refers to the ancient emperors in the ancestral temple to attach the post-deceased god to the ancestors to worship.
(2) Refers to sharing and offerings in general.
(3) Joint burial.
worship ancestors
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Department of Showing Characters] 　祔; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 841 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. Sacrifice name. [Said the text] The later deceased ate in the ancestors. 【Ritual·Tan Gong】It is easy to sacrifice for funeral sacrifices, and tomorrow's nephew will be with grandfather.　The burial together is also called the nephew. [Li·Tan Gong] Zhou Gong covers his nephew. [Note] The joint burial began since Zhougong. Confucius also said: The niece of the guardian is also separated, and the niece of the Lu is also fit, and the husband is good.　Or save for payment. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Great wish to Fu Lianxiang. [Note] Fu Dang is a nephew, offering sacrifices to the first king and the deceased after the nephew.

worship ancestors
Name meaning
Nothing.
fù
гл.
1) * рит. совершить жертвоприношение покойным родителям (после трёх лет траура); приобщить душу покойного к предку в родовом храме
祔于王父 принести жертву отцу вана
2) похоронить (в фамильном склепе, в могиле, напр. мужа)
祔窆 похоронить в той же могиле
